product_name: Imagine Surf Compressor Recruir Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Surely you can find the room to stash this lightweight inflatable paddle board! This all-around stand up paddle board is great for fitness paddling, touring, river running and light surfing.
short_description: Surely you can find the room to stash this lightweight inflatable paddle board! This all-around stand up paddle board is great for fitness paddling, touring, river running and light surfing.
